game.name: Pixel Car Cash Demolition v1
game.description:
Today you have entered the biggest truck demolition world! This brand new racing challenge combines the ultimate driving and action. Would you like to become the part of this completely new environment? If yes, Pixel Car Crash Demolition V1 is the best thing to do especially when you have some free time to enjoy and learn. Keep your emotions aside as nobody will spare you here! The only way to win is to fight hard against your opponents till the last breath.

Choose level and then car and gear up to destroy your opponents like never before! Be careful as your opponent is not going to show sympathy on you! It is time to become a hero in this area. But make sure to fight your way through all 5 addictive and challenging levels in this HTML5 driving simulator. Your nice efforts will go in vain since it will allow you to unlock the advanced mode of the game where lots of new fun possibilities will be there to welcome you.

Hit the cars of your opponents hard to crash their vehicles into the pieces and gain points to buy new advanced car models to play online without download! Select any option between the free mode and career mode in this 3D cool racing game! Try to keep your vehicle away from the tank to survive for long! There are multiple types of cars to play within the derby. Good luck to challenge all the rivals and win a secure position in this tough arena!
